text: Leandro Morgalla (born 13 September 2004) is a German professional footballer who plays as a defender for Austrian Football Bundesliga club Red Bull Salzburg. ==Club career== He joined 1860 Munich's academy from SpVgg Unterhaching at the age of 10. He made his senior debut on 11 August 2021in the Toto Cup game at SV Birkenfeld. He played the full distance in central defense, as he did in the second round game at BSC Saas Bayreuth a week later. On 21 August 2021, he was in the squad for the first time in a third division game. Three more nominations for the matchday squad followed. In the 2022/23 season he made 31 matches for the team. On 23 June 2023 Morgalla signed for RB Salzburg on a five-year deal. He was loaned to FC Liefering. ==International career== Morgalla played for the German U18 and U19 team. ==References== Category:2004 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Liefering players Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players
title: Leandro Morgalla
